name: Dig It! (itch) (Misfit Village)
description:
Play as a mole diggin' through the earth. Evade them bugs, get them coins!
WASD to move.

Made for Instituto Universitário da Maia - ISMAI university project (game dev course). Tasked with making a modern mobile game based on a concept from any old arcade game. I chose Dig Dug and came up with "Dig It!".

Developers:
Mladen Bošnjak - 3d art, concept
Hugo André Marques Vieira – programming
